title: Chickenpox vaccines for children on NHS starts across UK
description: For the first time, children will be offered vaccination on the NHS against the common infection which, in rare cases, can be very serious.
content:
All young children in the UK can now be offered protection against chickenpox for the first time on the NHS.
The vaccine will be combined with the existing MMR jab, given at 12 and 18 months of age, which already helps protect against measles, mumps ... [5677 chars]

title: Liverpool 0-0 Leeds United: Hugo Ekitike misses sitter in goalless draw at Anfield
description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Liverpool vs Leeds United in the Premier League
content:
Hugo Ekitike missed an open goal as Liverpool and Leeds started 2026 with the first goalless draw of Arne Slot's tenure at Anfeld.
Jeremie Frimpong's left-footed strike in the first half was met by Ekitike, who bizarrely ended up heading the ball in ... [3820 chars]

title: PDC world darts: Van Veen dumps Humphries out as Littler wins over crowd
description: Luke Littler won over the crowd with a 5-0 win against Krzysztof Ratajski while Gian van Veen showed his world title credentials with a 5-1 victory
content: For the third time in this match, Gian van Veen is lining up the bull finish for a 170. This time, though, he steps away from the oche, and as the noise builds and swells around him, as the applause hardens into a tribal rhythm, he smiles. And in tha... [4278 chars]

title: UK children to get chickenpox vaccine with measles, mumps and rubella jab
description: NHS to administer combined immunisation in move in line with approach in US, Canada, Australia and Germany
content:
Children in the UK are to be immunised against chickenpox at the same time as measles, mumps and rubella.
The NHS across the UK’s four home nations will administer a combined vaccine to young children to protect them against all four diseases from Fr... [3468 chars]

title: 'Horror on the dancefloor' and 'Traitors twist'
description: The fire at a Swiss ski resort bar which has killed dozens dominates Friday's front pages.
content: Most of Friday's papers lead with the fire at a Swiss ski resort bar which has killed dozens of people. "Horror on the dancefloor" is the headline for the Daily Star, which reports that British people are "feared to be among the dead" following the i... [1607 chars]
